text: Dirk Wolf (born 4 August 1972) is a former German footballer who played as a midfielder. Wolf is best known for playing in the Bundesliga with Eintracht Frankfurt and Borussia Mönchengladbach. Since his retirement, he has held coaching and managerial jobs at 1.
